name: Hotel Transylvania 3 Monsters Overboard
description:
Summary
Dracula, Mavis and their monster friends are marooned on the mysterious Lost Islands – and only you, in command of lovable little creatures, the Impa, can save them! Explore the islands, discover new Impa abilities, and rescue Frankenstein, Murray and Wayne from fearsome enemies. But hurry – the Drac-Pack’s lives are at stake!Key Features:
• Join Dracula, Mavis and the gang on a Monster New Adventure
• A mysterious storm has washed the Drac-pack overboard and only you can save the missing monsters
• Explore the legendary lost islands and collect secret treasure
• Meet new friends and battle dangerous enemies
• Reunite the Drac-pack and save the day in this hilarious new adventure
